response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. Considering my goal to maximize the return on this investment, I propose to offer it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise, allowing you to acquire a valuable asset while ensuring I receive a satisfactory return for my efforts and resources. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
